short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate all YouTube comments in bulk and copy emojis to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🈯 Looking for a tool that lets you translate all comments on a YouTube video at once? Explore the World with YouTube Lingo!

Discover a revolutionary way to connect globally with this innovative Chrome extension. YouTube Lingo lets you translate all comments on a video simultaneously into up to 10 languages, breaking language barriers and making it easier to engage with an international community—hassle-free!

Plus, take your interactions to the next level with a handy collection of emojis. Find the perfect emoji to creatively express your ideas and add a fun touch to your YouTube comments.

With bulk comment translation and a user-friendly interface, YouTube Lingo is the perfect tool to transform your YouTube experience.

🌍 Connect with the world effortlessly.
💬 Translate all comments at once, interact, and enjoy.

📥 Download it today and experience YouTube in a whole new way!
